pages.text: $(thing)Leather$() is an essential material for creating higher quality equipment and tools. However, I'll need to properly process and tan it for it to stand the test of time when I use it for crafting. Oh, the possibilities! I dream of useful things, from $(l:exploration/tools/backpack)backpacks$() to plate armor...

First, I'll need to scour the leather by running it through a $(l:innovation/light_machines/millstone)millstone$() to get scoured leather.$(br2)Then I should be able to throw it in a cooking cauldron with 4 pieces of $(thing)wood bark$() or 1 block of $(thing)dung$() to make tanned leather.$(br2)Afterwards, I can also cut up the leather into cut leather and leather straps with shears if necessary.
